title: TextClip
longDescription:
TextClip is a powerful utility to manage your clipboard history and recognize text from anywhere on your screen.

Features:

  • Access your clipboard history with a simple shortcut.
  • Capture text or QR codes from any image or video.
  • Requires Accessibility and Screen Capture permissions to work its magic.

title: Peak Browser
tagline: A minimal browser for maximum focus.
longDescription:
Peak Browser is designed from the ground up to be a distraction-free, minimal, and fast web browser. Focus on what matters without the clutter of traditional browsers.

Perfect for reading articles, doing research, or any task where focus is key.
